## What is Emotion AI? {background-image="img/duchenne.jpg"}

:::: {.absolute left="5%" top="65%" style="background-color: #ffffffbb; border-radius: 10px; padding: 5px;"}
The identification of an emotional state using objective indicators

- Text recognition used for sentiment analysis
- Physiological measurements (Heart Rate, Breathing Rate, Sweat)
- Bodily postures and … Facial expressions
:::

## [Unreliable Science Fed in AI]{style="color: white;"} {background-image="img/pexels-olly-3812743.jpg"}

<!-- ![](img/ekman.jpg){.absolute top=50 left=-150} -->

:::: {.absolute left="5%" top="10%" style="background-color: #ffffffbb; border-radius: 10px; padding: 5px;"}
Paul Ekman, in the 1970s:

- New method to categorise facial expressions:
  - FACS or Facial Action Coding System
  - Considers that micro-expressions are signs of deceptions

- New theory about Emotion
  - 7 Emotions
  - Universal 
  - Hard-wired into our biology
:::

## And most importantly…

::: {.incremental}
- We have **more** than 7 different emotions;
- We can do **more** than 7 different facial expression;
- We **can express** emotions that we don’t feel;
- We **can hide** emotions that we are feeling;
- We all have **our own ways** to express our emotions.
:::
